*

Her Escape

Jul 30, 2010

The One Who Left ran wildly about the backseat of the car. She had put up a good fight while trying to resist Montano, but she was simply no match for him and now found herself imprisoned. She desperately looked around for a means of escape, as it was imperative that she continue the allegorical game of life and death that she had been playing with The Old Dog and The Younger Dog. Her paw inadvertently rested on a switch, rolling the windows down to her surprise. She immediately jumped out the car, and having briefly seen the outline of Montano in the distance as she landed, dashed off into the dark parking garage. She had escaped, but she would have to run fast; Montano was coming.
